Class ProfileFragment

Object
Fragment
ProfileFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
ComponentCallbacks, View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, ActivityResultCaller, HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, LifecycleOwner, ViewModelStoreOwner, SavedStateRegistryOwner, PlacesAdapter.OnPlaceClickListener
public class ProfileFragment extends Fragment implements PlacesAdapter.OnPlaceClickListener
Profile Page Fragment Displays user information, places, statistics and account settings.

    • validatePasswordAndContinue

      private void validatePasswordAndContinue(String newUsername, String newEmail, String newPassword, String currentPassword)
      Validates the current password by attempting to log in. If successful, proceeds with the update.
      Parameters:
      newUsername - The new username to set (can be empty to keep unchanged).
      newEmail - The new email to set (can be empty to keep unchanged).
      newPassword - The new password to set (can be empty to keep unchanged).
      currentPassword - The current password for validation.

    • performUpdate

      private void performUpdate(String newUsername, String newEmail, String newPassword)
      Sends the update request to the server with the new account details.
      Parameters:
      newUsername - The new username to set (can be empty to keep unchanged).
      newEmail - The new email to set (can be empty to keep unchanged).
      newPassword - The new password to set (can be empty to keep unchanged).

    • getUpdateRequest

      private StringRequest getUpdateRequest(String newUsername, String newEmail, JSONObject requestBody, int userId)
      Creates a StringRequest for updating the user account.
      Parameters:
      newUsername - The new username to set (can be empty to keep unchanged).
      newEmail - The new email to set (can be empty to keep unchanged).
      requestBody - The JSON body containing update details.
      Returns:
      The configured StringRequest.

    • showDeleteConfirmationDialog

      private void showDeleteConfirmationDialog()
      Displays a confirmation dialog before deleting the account.

    • deleteAccount

      private void deleteAccount(int userId)
      Sends a DELETE request to the server to delete the user account. On success, clears SharedPreferences and navigates to LauncherActivity.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the user to delete.

    • logout

      private void logout()
      Logs out the user by clearing SharedPreferences and navigates to LauncherActivity.
